sections.heading: filing system; Secretary of State; duties; system requirements; fees
sections.text: The Secretary of State shall design and implement a central filing system for effective financing statements. The Secretary of State shall be the system operator. The system shall provide a means for filing effective financing stat

sections.heading: 52-1301 through 52-1321 were not intended to remove regular U
sections.text: C.C. provisions regarding the creation, perfection, or priority of security interests. Battle Creek State Bank v. Preusker, 253 Neb. 502, 571 N.W.2d 294 (1997).
